meanings.meaning: think nothing of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: [앞니 아님] 아무렇지 어 맵게? [Not his front teeth] He's not feeling anything. Oh? Spicy? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: [Not his front teeth] He's not feeling anything. Oh? Spicy?

vlive.korean: [아무렇지도 않게][처음처럼] 자 짜잔! [As if nothing happened] [Like the first time] Ta-da! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 잘생긴 애들끼리 친하면 생기는 일 [가두리횟집] VLOG 03
vlive.english: [As if nothing happened] [Like the first time] Ta-da!

vlive.korean: 넌 아무렇지도 않냐? How can you be so okay? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 짝녀의 소개팅남이 학교 핵인싸라면?_EP15_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: How can you be so okay?

vlive.korean: 이제 아무렇지 않아요. 맨날... I'm unaffected now. They always... 듣기 View video VICTON : 숩이 등장..! 앨리스 섭섭했어요?!😔
근데 애가 왜 이렇게 아무렇지 않아? But why is she so nonchalant? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 블링크 모해요 🧡
vlive.english: But why is she so nonchalant?

examples.korean: How can you be so cool about it? 발음듣기 넌 어쩜 그렇게 아무렇지도 않니? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. Mendy(girr****) Web Collection
examples.english: How can you be so cool about it? 발음

examples.korean: He seems cool enough at your house. 발음듣기 그는 너희 집에서는 아무렇지도 않게 보이더라 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. Mendy(girr****) Web Collection
examples.english: He seems cool enough at your house. 발음

examples.korean: Go on, it won't irk me. 발음듣기 해봐, 난 아무렇지도 않을거야. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. Ted Kim(tedj****) Web Collection
examples.english: Go on, it won't irk me. 발음

examples.korean: They'll think nothing of harming you. 발음듣기 그들은 너한테 해코지 하는걸 아무렇지도 않게 생각할거야 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 안녕(nmnm****) Web Collection
examples.english: They'll think nothing of harming you. 발음

examples.korean: I for one do not want to consume a product bred to absorb highly toxic weed killers with impunity. 발음듣기 나로 말하자면 독성이 매우 강한 제초제를 뿌려 키운 (유전자 변형) 식품을 아무렇지도 않은듯이 먹고 싶지는 않습니다.
